Texts.Chs: 所以你已经建造了一个^orange;炼金台^reset;，想要学习如何使用它吗？很简单，只是，请不要把自己炸成碎片。放置好它，通过制作一些用作肥料的^orange;护根^reset;，开始你的炼金之旅吧。
Texts.Eng: So you've built an ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset; and want to learn to use it? Simple enough. Just don't blow yourself to bits, please. Place it down and start by making some ^orange;Mulch^reset; for fertilizer.

^orange;Mulch^reset; is useful in a ^orange;Growing Tray^reset; as a ^green;weak fertilizer^reset;. You can craft all sorts of chemicals, plastics and lab-made materials. Be sure to upgrade the ^orange;Alchemy Table^reset; when you can!
Texts.Chs: ^orange;护根^reset;在^orange;木制托盘中有用^reset;作为^green;；弱肥^reset;。你可以制作各种化学品、塑料和实验室制造的材料。当你可以的时候，请确保升级^orange;炼金桌^reset;
